first_para: Jeremy Richard Streynsham Hunt, (born 1 November 1966) is a British Conservative Party politician, who is the Secretary of State for Health, and the Member of Parliament for South West Surrey. He was previously Culture Secretary (2010–12).

full.extract: Jeremy Richard Streynsham Hunt, (born 1 November 1966) is a British Conservative Party politician, who is the Secretary of State for Health, and the Member of Parliament for South West Surrey. He was previously Culture Secretary (2010–12).
full.title: Jeremy Hunt (politician)
